column4: how do I find out program launch command, if I know that it's (program's) name? f.e. xcursor-themes
how do I find out program launch command, if I know that it's (program's) name? f.e. xcursor-themes
oh thanks, I think that's exactly what I needed :]
you can also enter this: xprop | grep WM_CLASS into a terminal, then select the window of the application to get the package name
